articles.title: Dark oxygen made by deep sea 'batteries'
articles.description: The discovery that lumps of metal on the seafloor produce oxygen raises questions over plans to mine the deep ocean.
articles.content:
The scientists worked out that the metal nodules are able to make oxygen precisely because they act like batteries.
